typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FileSource
Select1 derive(dateOfETL = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
FileSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	)) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'movies[n].parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 10)) ~> StageData

source(output(
		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,
		int_rate as string,
		installment as string,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as string,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as string,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> loans
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> products
loans, products union(byName: false)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unionout.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	myparam as string
}
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> DataSource
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ParamsFile
ParamsFile derive(filedate = split(Column_1,'=')[1],
		filename = 'output/parts/'+split(Column_1,'=')[2]) ~> ParseFileName
DataSource, FilterToday join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		Function,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		filename
	)) ~> SelectCols
ParseFileName filter(instr(filedate,toString(currentDate(),'MM-dd-yy')) > 0) ~> FilterToday
SelectCols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filename',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		Function,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		playerID_yearID as string,
		BA as double,
		OBP as double,
		SLG as double,
		TB as integer,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string,
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer,
		currenttime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 1000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'playerID_yearID',
	partitionBy('external', 10)) ~> source1
source1 derive(nameLast = reverse(nameLast)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	keys:['playerID_yearID']) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(title = sha2(256,title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Emp ID} as string,
		{Name Prefix} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Middle Initial} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{E Mail} as string,
		{Father's Name} as string,
		{Mother's Name} as string,
		{Mother's Maiden Name} as string,
		{Date of Birth} as string,
		{Time of Birth} as string,
		{Age in Yrs.} as double '##.##',
		{Weight in Kgs.} as string,
		{Date of Joining} as string,
		{Quarter of Joining} as string,
		{Half of Joining} as string,
		{Year of Joining} as string,
		{Month of Joining} as string,
		{Month Name of Joining} as string,
		{Short Month} as string,
		{Day of Joining} as string,
		{DOW of Joining} as string,
		{Short DOW} as string,
		{Age in Company (Years)} as string,
		Salary as integer,
		{Last % Hike} as string,
		SSN as string,
		{Phone No. } as string,
		{Place Name} as string,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		Region as string,
		{User Name} as string,
		Password as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceName
MapNames derive(SoundexValue = soundex(fullname)) ~> FuzzyMatch
Orig1 aggregate(groupBy(SoundexValue),
	soundexmatch = sum(1)) ~> groupSoundex
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	)) ~> Orig1
groupSoundex, soundexBranch join(groupSoundex@SoundexValue == soundexBranch@SoundexValue,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> soundexJoin
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	)) ~> soundexBranch
soundexJoin aggregate(groupBy(phone,
		soundexBranch@SoundexValue),
	phonematch = sum(1),
		acctnum_agg = last(acctnum)) ~> groupPhone
soundexJoin select(mapColumn(
		soundexmatch,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue = soundexBranch@SoundexValue
	)) ~> phoneBranch
groupPhone, phoneBranch join(acctnum_agg == acctnum,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'none')~> phoneJoin
phoneJoin aggregate(groupBy(zip,
		phoneBranch@SoundexValue),
	zipcount = sum(1),
		acctnum_agg = last(acctnum_agg)) ~> groupZip
phoneJoin select(mapColumn(
		phonematch,
		soundexmatch,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone = phoneBranch@phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue = phoneBranch@SoundexValue
	)) ~> zipBranch
groupZip, zipBranch join(acctnum_agg == acctnum,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'none')~> zipJoin
zipJoin derive(soundexweight = 50,
		zipweight = 25,
		phoneweight = 25,
		soundexbool = iif (soundexmatch > 1, 1, 0),
		zipbool = iif (zipcount > 1, 1, 0),
		phonebool = iif (phonematch > 1, 1, 0)) ~> setConstants
setConstants derive(matchscore = (soundexbool * 50) + (zipbool * 25) + (phonebool * 25)) ~> matchScore
matchScore select(mapColumn(
		phone,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		zip = zipBranch@zip,
		matchscore
	)) ~> finalResult
CreateFullName select(mapColumn(
		phone = {Phone No. },
		zip = Zip,
		fullname,
		acctnum = {Emp ID}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		ERROR_FUNCTION('')
	)) ~> MapNames
sourceName derive(fullname = {First Name} + ' ' + {Last Name}) ~> CreateFullName
finalResult split(matchscore > 50,
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckForDupes@(Duplicates, NotDupe)
CheckForDupes@Duplicates sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dupes.csv']) ~> sinkDupes
CheckForDupes@NotDupe sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['nodupes.csv']) ~> sinkNoDupes

parameters{
	movieName as string
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSQLDatabase
sourceSQLDatabase alterRow(deleteIf(title==$movieName)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	keys:['movie'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> deleteRows

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(movie = toInteger(movie),
		newtitle = toInteger(title)) ~> typeConversions
typeConversions split(isNull(movie) || isNull(newtitle),
	disjoint: false) ~> checkForNulls@(errorRows, goodRows)
checkForNulls@errorRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['errorRows.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> errorRows
checkForNulls@goodRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['goodRows.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> goodRows

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviescsv
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> moviesdb
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesparquet
moviescsv, moviesdb join(moviescsv@movie == moviesdb@movie,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1, moviesparquet join(toInteger(moviescsv@movie) == MovieId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		movie = moviescsv@movie,
		title = moviescsv@title,
		year = moviescsv@year,
		Rating = moviescsv@Rating,
		movie = moviesdb@movie,
		year = moviesdb@year,
		Rating = moviesdb@Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		dateOfETL,
		MovieIdDupe,
		ActionDupe,
		MovieId,
		Genre,
		Rating = moviesparquet@Rating,
		RottenTom,
		Action
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(movieagg = movie),
	each(match(true()), $$ = first(toString($$)))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(year = toInteger(year),
		Rating = toInteger(Rating)) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 select(mapColumn(
		movieagg,
		movie,
		title,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		dateOfETL,
		MovieId,
		Genre,
		Action
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 sort(asc(year, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,

		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 200)) ~> source1
source1 derive(emp_title = reverse(emp_title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,
		int_rate as string,
		installment as string,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as string,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as string,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'myfilename') ~> OneBigLoansFile
OneBigLoansFile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'loans[n].csv',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20)) ~> ManySmallerLoansParts

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesParquet
moviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating
	)) ~> PruneCols1
moviesParquet select(mapColumn(
		Title2 = Title,
		RottenTom,
		Year2 = Year
	)) ~> PruneCols2
PruneCols1, PruneCols2 join(soundex(title) == soundex(Title2)
	&& toInteger(year) == Year2,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 filter((!isNull(Title2) && !isNull(title)) && toInteger(year) > 1900) ~> FilterBadRows
FilterBadRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fuzzylookup.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
moviesCSV derive(movies = @(movieid=movie,
		title=title,
		genres=split(genres,'|'),
		year=year,
		rating=Rating)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies.json'],
	mapColumn(
		movies
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> makeJSON

parameters{
	prodid as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('select * from saleslt.product  where productid = ',$prodid)),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:($prodid + '.csv'),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	mywildpath as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[('DateFiles/'+$mywildpath)]) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Prop_0
	)) ~> movieDailyUpdate
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movieOrig
movieDailyUpdate select(mapColumn(
		movie = Prop_0,
		title = Prop_1,
		genre = Prop_2,
		year = Prop_3,
		rating = Prop_4,
		rottom = Prop_5,
		action = Prop_6
	)) ~> SetFields
SetFields derive(each(match(lower(name)=='movie'||lower(name)=='year'||lower(name)=='rating'||lower(name)=='rottom'), $$ = toInteger($$))) ~> Casting
Casting sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genre,
		year,
		rating,
		rottom
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		movie
	)) ~> moviesOutParquetFolder

transformations.name: Myprojection
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'myfilename',
	partitionRootPath: 'partdata',
	wildcardPaths:['partdata/**/**/*.parquet']) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Title = reverse(Title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(MovieIdDupe = toInteger(byName('MovieIdDupe')),
		ActionDupe = toString(byName('ActionDupe')),
		MovieId = toInteger(byName('MovieId')),
		Title = toString(byName('Title')),
		Genre = toString(byName('Genre')),
		Year = toInteger(byName('Year')),
		Rating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		RottenTom = toInteger(byName('RottenTom')),
		Action = toString(byName('Action')),
		releaseyear = toInteger(byName('releaseyear')),
		Month = toInteger(byName('Month'))) ~> Myprojection
Myprojection filter(releaseyear == 2019) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		releaseyear,
		Month
	)) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		member_id as string,
		loan_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt as string,
		funded_amnt_inv as string,
		term as string,
		int_rate as string,
		installment as string,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as string,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as string,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as string,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> loans
Filter1 pivot(groupBy(zip_code),
	pivotBy(grade),
	NumberOf_ = count(1),
	columnNaming: '$N$V_Grades',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
loans filter(length(zip_code)==5) ~> Filter1
Pivot1 derive(NumberOf_A_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_A_Grades')),
		NumberOf_B_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_B_Grades')),
		NumberOf_C_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_C_Grades')),
		NumberOf_D_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_D_Grades')),
		NumberOf_E_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_E_Grades')),
		NumberOf_F_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_F_Grades')),
		NumberOf_G_Grades = toLong(byName('NumberOf_G_Grades'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		zip_code,
		NumberOf_A_Grades,
		NumberOf_B_Grades,
		NumberOf_C_Grades,
		NumberOf_D_Grades,
		NumberOf_E_Grades,
		NumberOf_F_Grades,
		NumberOf_G_Grades
	)) ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movies as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as string,
		Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(locate('title',lower(name))!=0),
			'title' = $$),
		each(match(locate('year',lower(name))!=0),
			'year' = $$),
		each(match(locate('rating',lower(name))!=0),
			'rating' = $$),
		each(match(locate('genre',lower(name))!=0),
			'genre' = $$)
	)) ~> MapCanonicalModel
Filter1 derive(year = toInteger(year),
		rating = toInteger(rating)) ~> Cast
Cast aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AvgRating = round(avg(rating),2)) ~> AvgRatingByYear
MapCanonicalModel filter(year == '1986') ~> Filter1
AvgRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
